title: Coronation Street airs special extra episode tonight as Sinead dies without Daniel

Coronation Street is airing a special extra episode tonight ahead of Sinead Tinker's harrowing death.

The ITV soap usually airs double episodes on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays, but for one night only there will be a separate Thursday night edition.

Corrie fans will be desperate to know what happens next after Sinead appeared to be on her deathbed during Wednesday night's dramatic climax.

While Sinead slept in her bed next to emotional Beth Tinker, her husband Daniel Osbourne went off the rails and collapsed in a drunken stupor.

Corrie viewers will have to wait until 8.30pm tonight to find out whether Sinead is still alive.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

In tonight's emotional episode, Sinead wakes up and initially has no recollection of her blazing row with Daniel.

She then remembers what happened, but is determined to forget about her husband and film some home videos for Bertie to remember her by.

Sinead wants to make sure Bertie realises how much she loved him, knowing that she will miss his first birthday, his first day at school and his wedding day.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Elsewhere, the Barlows are frantic with worry when Daniel fails to return home.

Dastardly Daniel passed out by the canal after downing a bottle of vodka.

After gazing at Bertie's dummy, which had 'mummy's boy' written on, Daniel went for another swig of booze.

But he passed out and the bottle fell out of his hand and rolled away to the edge of the water.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

This came after Sinead discovered Bethany Platt's notebook and came to a shocking realisation.

She asked Daniel what was going on with Bethany, but he struggled to give a straight answer and dug himself a bigger hole.

Daniel eventually confessed that he had kissed Bethany - leaving Sinead to throw him out.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

The dramatic storyline has come under fire from some Corrie fans.

Many complained that the cheating element 'cheapened' Sinead's death, which was powerful enough to stand alone.

Will Sinead die in tonight's episode?

*Coronation Street airs Mondays, Wednesday and Fridays on ITV at 7.30pm and 8.30pm
description: Coronation Street was left on a dramatic climax on Wednesday night as Sinead lied dying while Daniel collapsed in a drunken stupor
